name: Jelly Pacifist
description:
You are a jellyfish monk exploring the deep. Can you maintain your pacifist vow?

CONTROLS:

Up Arrow Key: Float Upward 

Left Arrow Key: Float Left

Right Arrow Key: Float Right.

This is a submission for Ludum Dare 48, whose theme is deeper and deeper. All code, design, and visual/audio assets were made during the jam.
